965.question: Which hyperparameters were varied in the experiments on the four tasks?
965.response: {'Answer': 'The following hyperparameters were varied in the experiments on the four tasks: word embedding model (skipgram, cbow, glove), embedding dimension (40, 100), window size (w5, w10), and dataset (wiki, no wiki). Additionally, the number of clusters (100, 250, 500, 1000, 2000) was varied.'}
965.answer: number of clusters, seed value in clustering, selection of word vectors, window size and dimension of embedding
